attributes.action: Pass into law that Tax Avoidance and Tax Evasion have the same meaning
attributes.background: To enable the Government to collect the rightful Tax Due and cut the cost of collecting it down

rejection.details:
We are not sure what change you want Parliament to make to tax law.

You might be interested in signing one of these petitions:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/111953
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/110862
